name: Buttermilk Ranch Cheeseball
author: Sharon Casto
summary: This is the quickest and easiest appetizer I know of.  It takes only minutes to make and can be served almost immediately. You can keep the ingredients on hand for months. Serve with buttery crackers.
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package ranch dressing mix (such as Hidden Valley Ranch ®)
directions: Mix the sour cream with ranch dressing mix in a bowl until smoothly combined
Add the cream cheese and Cheddar cheese to the bowl, and mix together with your hands until thoroughly blended
Chill the mixture for 5 minutes, then shape into a ball
Place the pecans into a shallow bowl, and roll all sides of the cheese ball in the pecans to coat
